review: Quick and easy setup.  No instruction books needed.  Helpful guide once plugged in.  Love it.
author: April May "april12"

review: A must if you have Netflix or Prime
author: Michael T.

review: I was under the impression that I would get prime movies at a discount - very disappointed.
author: douglas bess

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick is pretty great. Sometimes it lags, but its only for the 1st few seconds of starting a show.  Other than that, it is perfect alternative for people that dont have a smart tv.
author: Jonathan Colas

review: I love it. I have this and Chromecast and love how the apps are essentially built-in to the fireTv stick.  Very easy to navigate with the included remote.
author: Slayermetal02

review: Love having a remote & all the apps.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Good qualities and a great seller.
author: Deon Davis

review: Love Love Love the Amazon Fire TV stick.  Not only can I watch Amazon Prime movies, videos, TV shows, etc.  I can listen to music and view my pictures (and create slide shows for friends to view).  I'm extremely happy with it!
author: Venus Alyea

review: Easy to setup and the menus are user friendly. The remote works good. It would be nice to have a few more free programs to choose from
author: Fjeld
